name: recom
description: A template for an e-commerce application/website, made with React!

scripts.heroku: npm run ins & npm run bld & npm run prod
scripts.production:proxy: cd ./proxy && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start
scripts.production:server: cd ./server && cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run start
scripts.build:admin: cd ./admin && cross-env NODE_ENV=production REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL=http://localhost:4000 npm run build
scripts.build:client: cd ./client && cross-env NODE_ENV=production REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL=http://localhost:4000 npm run build
scripts.development:admin: cd ./admin && cross-env REACT_APP_BACKEND_URL=http://localhost:4000 BROWSER=none PORT=3050 npm start
scripts.development:server: cd ./server && cross-env JWT_SECRET=abc DB_URI="mongodb://the_username:the_password@localhost:27017/store" npm run dev

author: ronituohino
